patthana8.31:1.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.31:1.1_1: Ganthavippayuttaṁ naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.31:1.1_2: Ganthavippayuttaṁ naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naganthaniyo ca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.31:2.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ naaganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.31:3.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ naganthaniyañca ganthavippayuttaṁ naaganthaniyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.31:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
